{{cpp/title|permutable}}
{{cpp/iterator/navbar}}
{{ddcl | header=iterator | since=c++20 | 1=
template&lt; class I &gt;
concept permutable =
    std::forward_iterator&lt;I&gt; &amp;&amp;
    std::indirectly_movable_storable&lt;I, I&gt; &amp;&amp;
    std::indirectly_swappable&lt;I, I&gt;;
}}

The concept {{tt|permutable}} refines {{lc|std::forward_iterator}} by adding requirements for reordering through moves and swaps.

===Semantic requirements===
{{tt|I}} models {{tt|permutable}} only if all concepts it subsumes are modeled.
